title: Hour 2: Season Start
description:
The NFL is back! So which team will win the opening game, Buffalo or LA? Find out why Dan Orlovsky is going with Josh Allen and the Bills. Plus, Stephen A. says there will be no postseason for the Panthers and Baker Mayfield. Next, Stephen A. and Dan Orlovsky argue over who has higher ceiling this season, the Packers or the Chiefs. Later, find out why Damian Woody thinks Tua will get his first taste of playoff football this year.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
